title: New free champion rotation: Karthus, Urgot, Vayne and more!

replies.body:
**The Free Rotation, Episode 6:**

***Somewhere under an army tent in a battle zone:***

{{champion:37}} "..."

{{champion:150}} "Sona, where have you been for the past week? Nevermind, we will talk about it later. You missed out on a lot."

{{champion:37}} "???"

{{champion:150}} "Don't be so pushy Sona. Veigar got the last dfg and is on a crazed rampage. I called in the commando's to stop him, i'm currently awaiting a status report."

*"Ring ring"*

{{champion:150}} "Hello, this is Corporate Gnar."

{{champion:59}} "Yes, this is Commando Jarvan, i have just respawned and have some bad news. we cant beat Veigar."

{{champion:150}} "What! how can one yordle stop all five of you?"

{{champion:59}} "I will give you a rundown of what happened. Lux and Galio were instantly caught in his event horizon before they could do anything. Galio got hit with dfg and both of them were subsequently destroyed by his dark matter. Garen was able to evade those two powers, but just couldn't dodge his baleful strike and was defeated."

{{champion:150}} "That's horrible, what else?"

{{champion:59}} "Xin and i managed to get close, but as soon as we did, Xin just got blasted with primordial burst. Even though he had no ability power, he died. It was up to me, and he was weak, it was an epic battle but i managed to slay him."

{{champion:150}} "Then whats the bad news?"

{{champion:59}} "He has revive, that normally useless spell won't let him die. He was back instantly and killed me."

{{champion:150}} "Ok, prepare for round two, i'm gonna have a talk with someone."

{{champion:59}} "Roger that sir."

{{champion:37}} "???"

{{champion:150}} "Someone i hate, but he is out best shot at beating Veigar.
*Ahem,* connect me to head of league balance"

{{champion:64}} "Hello, this is corporate lee sin, who am i speaking to?"

He spoke with an american businessman accent. He wore: a pair of sunglasses, a white business shirt with the sleeves rolled up, a striped tie and a pair of tweed pants. All topped with messy blonde hair.

{{champion:150}} "Its me, Corporate Gnar, i need your help."

{{champion:64}} "Ahah, Gnarly, what did ya screw up this time?"

{{champion:150}} "Its Veigar, he has escaped and we cant stop him, not even the best of the best can do anything against him."

{{champion:64}} "Did you try commando Galio?"

{{champion:150}} "Veigar got a hold of the last working dfg."

{{champion:64}} "Well you really got a lot of problems on your hands, don't ya Gnarly? Well ok, i have been meaning to change Veigar,  i wasn't planning on it for a while. But for you, i'll do it now. Put me in touch with commando Jarvan for the details on what Veiger needs and i'll call ya back when i have the changes in place."

{{champion:150}} "Now that that's done, i need to vent. Sona, listen to how i did the free champions this week. I started off with Udyr and Xin Zhao, because people are still complaining that the jungle is too hard, they shouldn't have that problem with these champions."

{{champion:37}} "..."

{{champion:150}} "Yeah Sona, i know. Anyways, we stopped seeing enough Vayne smurfs, i blame it on her being too expensive for new accounts, so i made her free. Zilean is getting changed, so players might like him now. I don't know why i make Urgot free, no one ever plays him, except that one guy. But maybe this time someone else will play him. Now that Karthus can't keep teamfighting four times, he can be free again.

*"ring ring"*

{{champion:150}} "Are they done?"

{{champion:64}} "Yeah, all fixed. Your commandos can now evade most of his damage, and his ult shouldn't one shot any of you anymore. Don't let anyone know this is the reason, but i also removed revive for ya, so he will stay dead long enough to capture him."

{{champion:150}} **"Alright commandos, get me that Veigar!"**

{{champion:59}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:5}} **"SIR YES SIR!"**

{{champion:59}} "Alright, there is a lot of anti-magic energy coming from over there, it must be Veigar. Lets get him."

{{champion:99}} "Surrender now Veigar, you are weaker than before. Come quietly and i wont laugh when we bring you in."

**[???]** "Veigar isn't here, my fellow anti-mage is off somewhere else. It is only i."

{{champion:38}} **"Harbinger Kassadin, muhahahahah!** Now to make my escape."

{{champion:99}} "Not if i bind you!"

{{champion:38}} "Ill just riftwalk away, haha."

"Light binding struck home"

{{champion:38}} "I can't riftwalk as far, **CURSE YOU LEE SIN!!!** Alright, take me to jail."

{{champion:99}} "Ehehaha, looks like you got, *"puts on sunglasses"* binded by the light." http://cow.org/csi/

{{champion:3}} "Booooo!"

{{champion:99}} "Now, since you didn't come quietly, **EHEEAHAHAHEAHAHAEAHAHAHAHAH!!!!!**" http://www.finalesfunkeln.com/

{{champion:38}} "OH GOD NO, PLEASE MAKE IT STOP!!!!"

{{champion:86}} "Isn't it bad enough i have to put up with this at home, stop torturing us along with the bad guys Lux."

**Meanwhile:**

{{champion:64}} "Thanks for telling me Kassadin was gonna be a problem and needed his riftwalk changed. go talk to art about those new icons, and i threw in a couple changes to you as well buddy."

{{champion:26}} "I knew you would do that."
Going to be salty here for a second and say these aren't really that funny, they're just getting annoying. Also the standings for the champions are getting annoying.

First of all, this isn't constructive at all. If you don't like my stories, At least tell me why. maybe i can work on it and get better.

You don't have to read them. I enjoy making them and based on the comments and upvotes, people enjoy reading them.

If you don't like any story/statistic posts in the comments, why do come here? To read about how players just bought these champs, or how Riot didn't pick x champ to be free.
I find posts like mine add some humor to the once very negative comments and i actually scroll down past the main post now.

If you don't like what i'm doing, tell me how you think i could do it better or just ignore it. Its a waste of everybody's time to just complain like that with no constructive feedback.

You tell em **Dellron!** I completely enjoy reading these and will always continue to read them. Annoying is the last thing I can think these are... pretty sure they're entertaining. Somebody just needed something to complain about today, that's all. {{champion:35}}

If you'd like some constructive feedback, make the stories relevant. They're called the free rotation but have nothing to do with the rotation and I must admit the story is structured fine,yet the storyline its self is inconsistent between episodes.
The reason I was so salty is because I didn't understand why people liked them so much; they seem random and mildly nonsensical. Down vote me (again) if you'd like, or otherwise carry on.

Thank you, that is all i wanted. 
I have been in a three part story with Veigar and dfg, i'm planning on getting back to the more free rotation side next week or so. 

There is only so much that can be written about the free champs, so it will still focus more on the characters.

You have given me something to think about, and i will remember your feedback when doing future episodes.

I understand that there will be negative feedback, but if it doesn't do anything other than waste time i'm going to let them know.
Your original comment didn't help me improve in any way. this new one is negative, but in a good way.
it will make what i write better.
WAIT A SEC!!! REVIVE GOT REMOVED.....SO IS VEIGAR..........CHEATING!?
Shhhh, don't tell anyone. But, Veigar is the secret reason it got removed.
gotta love dellron and lightdragooon. xD
Gotta love people who love Dellron and Lightdragoon :).
Gotta love people who love people for loving Dellron and Lightdragoon because they love Dellron and Lightdragoon

So are {{champion:78}} and {{champion:83}} never on free week?

(Btw, what happened to Lord Moriz)

Yeah, Poppy and yorick are currently banned from the free rotation until they get a rework.

Not really sure what happened to Lord Moriz. I heard he teaches a writing class and doesn't have time to do his stories anymore. But i'm not if that's true or not.

{{champion:64}} Boss: Who are you again?

> [{quoted}](name=Pittboss2015,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=TngJZ0Na,comment-id=00250000,timestamp=2015-03-04T15:07:36.302+0000)
>
> {{champion:64}} Boss: Who are you again?

If LoL was a business and its champions were employees, Lee would be the CEO, and Urgot would be that hobo living in the dumpster behind one of their local stores (along with Azir, Kassadin, and Veigar).
Lee would be too busy shagging Nidalee (his secretary) in his corporate office to ever meet Urgot.
We really, really, REALLY need a battle bunny Urgot
hello noobs!
Says the bronze.
You have the best name NA

"They will remember Yorick Morrey" -Riot 2012
